Literally the only negative thing I can say is that the slippers provided at night were the wrong size! Like I say.... that is the ONLY negative thing I could think of! Will stay there again, actually can't wait t return!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Safirah
Reviews.Content: An absolutely fantastic hotel - a great concept, lovely, spotless rooms, great service and amenities, fantastic, helpful staff, and a great, relaxed atmosphere. The snack bar is really great - all of the food was truly excellent (especially the wonderful little puddings and salads served in glass jars throughout the day). The Bodega (honesty box bar) was a lovely touch and a nice improvement on the Barcelona Casa Camper which we stayed in last year and which is similarly good, but I think the Berlin one definitely has a slight edge. The only thing that marred our stay slightly was that building works next door meant that our room ended up smelling of drainage works throughout the time we were there which was a bit unfortunate. Otherwise, I can't recommend this hotel highly enough - I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, can't find a fault”
Reviews.Author: Flonaldo
Reviews.Content: The Casa Camper is the best hotel I've stayed at so far in Europe. And I've been to a dozen different countries, stayed at Marriotts and Intercontinentals etc. I think that's high praise and the Casa Camper deserves all of it. My room was very large, especially the bathroom area. I think all of the "corner" rooms are a liitle bigger than the others (which are still quite big) and have big bathtubs plus large showers. Everything was clean and modern. All of the staff were friendly. The location is very good. It's a short walk to the Museum Island and a lot of other sites of interest as well. On top of that, the hotel is actually right on top of a U-bahn station. The station entrance is no more than 20 meters from the hotel door. The line (U8) doesn't take you anywhere interesting really but it's easy to change lines at Alexanderplatz. In-room Wi-Fi was perfect. There are two Macs and a printer to use on the top floor. The best and most distinguishing feature of this hotel is the Tentiempie: the top floor restaurant area with great views. Breakfast is very good and served until 11am on weekdays, until 2pm on weekends. To top it off you can go there for snacks anytime you want by yourself - or just take something away to your room. There are croissants, fresh fruit, crisps, coffee and tea, a fridge full of sodas, juices and bottled water etc. etc. - all for free. The top floor area also has a self-service bar that works on the honor system. So you could mix yourself a drink, just how you like it. A/C worked great even though the temperatures were over 30C most of the time. I highly recommend the Casa Camper for anyone visiting Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Best on all levels”
Reviews.Author: mea2001
Reviews.Content: I did a huge Europe trip and I decided to splurge on a suite at Casa Camper. The service, cleanliness, and rooms were FANTASTIC. What I loved about the hotel is that it's very practical and functional. It's not trying to be overly trendy and overly designed to the point that things don't make sense. For example there are many hooks for your bags, towels are placed in the perfect spot, the 24 hour access to food makes so much sense especially when you get hungry from a long day but don't want to go out to get a meal. I really can't say anything bad about this hotel. It is worth the money if you can afford it! Locationwise - it's ridiculous how easy it is to get there. Don't even bother with a taxi! There are elevators if you have heavy luggage and no gates to go through (Just make sure you have a validated metro ticket). It is so easy to get everywhere so don't worry about location. However if you DO need a taxi, there are taxi ranks right outside of the hotel or they can call one for you. Best service ever and I've traveled quite a bit. I will always stay at Casa Camper if I ever visit Berlin again.

Reviews.Title: “Love this hotel”
Reviews.Author: VWL
Reviews.Content: I am most impressed with Casa Camper Hotel. The room was well-designed. The snack bar was a godsend. The service with excellent with confirmation few days ahead of the day. When my flight was delayed, they contacted the transfer company to re-arrange. The location was excellent. Within walking distance to Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt. You can always charge U-bahn right outside the hotel if you don't want to walk. Will definitely stay there again if I ever get a chance to go back to Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel by which all others will be judged”
Reviews.Author: tomatron
Reviews.Content: Splendid place ... it's as if someone actually took some real time to think about what travellers really want. Looks fantastic and feels great too ... just like the shoes.

Reviews.Title: “Second Time Around Still A Charm”
Reviews.Author: Osamede
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Casa Camper for the 2nd time in a month, this time around with my wife and a child in tow for a 2-days visit. So I will not repeat any territory I covered in my first review but focus only on 2nd time impression and the additional element of having a child along while staying at this hotel. Overall I really enjoyed my stay here again and found the service to be of a very high level and extremely consistent among the staff, particularly down at the reception where the people there were pretty much flawless. Having notified the hotel in advance that we would have a toddler along with us, they correctly provided the sleeping cot we had requested. Better yet, they also placed in the room a small bathtub and some baby wipes etc, which was very helpful. We were impressed by that. On this second visit, I think I would say that the hotel could and should improve the airflow in the rooms, particularly as one cannot open the windows at all. - When you first enter the room, the fan is on low setting it the room smells slightly musty which spoils the first impression. This goes away once you set the fan on high, but still, a first impression counts and it makes you question things. - The room air can be stuffy if you dont keep the fan speed up at the "high setting". Even then, it doesnt create superb air conditions but just barely beyond ok. I'm sure this has to do with the environmental aspect of the way they seem to want to operate the hotel, but in my opinion this hotel seems to focus on making the guest comfortable and air quality is a big factor there Anyway overall I wouldnt want to harp too much on that one complaint, but just wanted to detail exactly what I meant by it. We tried to make an appointment at the famous restaurant downstairs in the first floor of the hotel, but were not able to. They were closed on Mondays and on other night that they were open apparently they offer only a fixed menu that takes a couple of hours and would not accommodate anyone wanting a quicker or shorter meal. Strange, but so it was. Fortunately this area of Mitte has no shortage of restaurants and we enjoyed eating at a couple of them. I will do separate reviews on those. Also this time around at Casa Camper, I really felt the value of this location just slightly away from the really heavy duty road traffic in on Torstrasee and the road near Alexanderplatz. That makes for a really nice settiing for a family type of visit. Relatively calm and a lot of very cute streets and shops nearby. There is a small park with simple playground near Auguststrasse that was was convenient for taking a child out to play a bit, climb some slides sit on the swing etc. My daughter also really enjoyed a visit to "Milchhalle" near the same park for milkshake afterwards. So a good second visit at this hotel and surprisingly comfortable with a small child in tow.We really had a nice time here and I rate it just as high in performance as I did the first time

Reviews.Title: “not bad choice”
Reviews.Author: ThanosVeroia
Reviews.Content: on the return of Krakow,i had a stop in Berlin for business affairs. we stayed for two nights,the hotel is clean,enough professional style.the rooms not so spacious but it was not a problem.generally had everything you need for e decent stay but not something more.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel that fits you like your favourite shoe...”
Reviews.Author: Mike_Marseille
Reviews.Content: You know the tired Hotel cliche about being 'a home away from home' - and they never are -- well this one is! Hospitality is about the details and here you see what happens when great designers get to work on designing the best possible home a way from home experience. The lounge/breakfast/business/honor bar library floor - yes all than in one space - is brilliant. The Bath room has the best showers i have seen i years - WiFi flows like water as it should, even in the sauna... ( I am so tired of all the hoops some hotels put us through just to get on the web) Did i mention the slippers, the ipod play station, the bathrobe the list is long and every little thing is just the best. The Sauna actually works it is steaming hot and there is a really cold power shower to follow - not the tepid drizzle that is typical of so many Hotel sauna rooms - add to that superior service but in the personal welcoming attentive way that is so rare. Roll 'em out Camper we need one of these in all the major European cities. (I spend 75+ nights in hotels a year)

Reviews.Title: “Best Boutique Hotel in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: CBR1000RR
Reviews.Content: Casa Camper Berlin is a true jewel in the hotel business. ·It has a perfect location in the historical centre of Berlin which allows walking sightseeing. It is next to a subway and a railway station ·Rooms are nicely decorated with lots of attention to details. Try the slippers or the shower, they are quite unique. My room was very quiet, excellent for a good night sleep ·You can tell that professionals are managing this hotel by the unique attention to details. I love the key card and the little booklet you receive at the reception ·The lounge is open 24/7. Plenty of munchies during the day. Chocolate Brownies, cocktails in the evening. Breakfast is just great and you can even have your favorite omelette. ·There is a business corner with Apple computers and a seperate section if you want to read and relax ·The restaurant is a must. Try to sit on the large wooden table in front of the kitchen and enjoy watching your food been prepared by a multi-national team of cooks . It is a true travel in the culinary land where there is always something happening and worth discovering. ·Try the wine BRUTUS - I believe it is bottled by the owner of the hotel - but you will find some excellent Burgundy as well The hotel is truly First Class with an experienced staff and management coming from only the best hotels. Unnecessary overhead have been cut making the price of the room very affordable and a great value not only for tourists but also for businessmen. If you are in Berlin, don't hesitate and stay at Casa Camper -. Mi Casa Es Su Casa !

Reviews.Title: “Camper”
Reviews.Author: alexctrip
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, one of the best showers in my life!!! Good service, lounge open 24 hours with all food and drinks on the house.

Reviews.Title: “casa camper berlin”
Reviews.Author: oarystys
Reviews.Content: intelligent, comfort, convenient, trendy, design, well located, excellent restaurant, excellent staff

HotelInfo.Name: Casa Camper Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Weinmeister Strasse 1, 10178 Berlin, Germany
